players.name: Bob
memory: The villager Alice was found dead.
Diana: "I didn't kill Alice. Bob is the mafia. Charlie is the detective."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and found her to be the mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana and confirmed she is mafia. Alice died last night; no other suspects. Vote Diana out. Bob, I trust your judgment, let's finish this."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
